# SAKURATSU-CLASS SALVAGE SHUTTLE
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Medium
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 2-5
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] Plasma
[color=#a4885c]Expeditions:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]Available Roles:[/color] Contractor, Pilot, Mercenary
"The Sakuratsu is a shuttle that has capabilities for salvage, and light cargo transport. The ship is also equipped with a research console and server."
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check if the APC units are charged. - Check if all APC units are toggled on.
## 1.2. P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit
- Check if the P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units is anchored to the floor. - Check if the P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units is set to HV output. - Set Target Power for 20** [bold]k[/bold]W on all 3. - Start the P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check if the canisters for oxygen and nitrogen is anchored to the ports in the engineering section of the ship. - Check if the distribution pump is set to normal pressure (101kPa). - Enable the distribution pump. - If swapping canisters for distro, ensure that the nitrogen/oxygen mix is at 78/22 with the gas mixer.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Enable waste loop pump. - Disable Auto Mode on the Air Alarms around the ship. - Set the Air Alarm in the Engine Room to FILTERING. - If there is a dangerous gas in the atmosphere, set the Air Alarm in the room to PANIC. - If a room is lacking sufficient atmosphere, set the Air Alarm in the room to FILL.
## 3. Other checks
- Check if the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check if the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
## Sidenotes
* - Sakuratsu-class ships are fitted with canister filling rooms. This will be the room with the door in atmos colors. This is NOT a second distro.
** - The door for the salvage bay is on the right side of the rear. This is the only dedicated door for salvage on the ship.
*** - The max power the generators can provide is 75** [bold]k[/bold]W, this is not recommended however, as this will be quite ineffecient.
